favourite.article: I was really touched by this hymn, this is so true in our experience. Lord Jesus, by myself I cannot please You. Lord Jesus, feel free to make home in my heart, occupy and posses my whole being until You'll be magnified in me.
I'm glad I looked for the recently commented songs. Beautiful!

I love the progression in this hymn. "Little willingness" becomes "I say yes and give You full permission" and "'Tis my joy to give You all the ground." WOW! Saints, I'm deeply moved by this hymn! Thank You, Lord, for being the One who can capture my heart and my being in such a way! Lord, You are so lovely! I love You, my Beloved!

Lord, may we be those who give our whole being to you to enter into every room of our being to make our hearts a dwelling place for You to come in and settle down. That You dear Lord would be magnified in us.
My heart longs for absolute surender! That You dear Lord would be magnified in me.

This song helps me to be released from my self and to enter into the Holy of Holies. I experienced the sweetness and satisfaction within. "Lord I want to give You full permission to touch every corner of my heart. Make my heart a dwelling place for You. I want You to be at home within me."

Lord we agree with every word of this song. We'd like to be wholly consecrated to you but are not willing to lay all on the altar. But Lord we have You as the absolute One in our being who can break through all the barriers until every corner of our heart is fully Your home. Lord Jesus do it for Your satisfaction and rest. AMEN.
Lord cleanse my heart from all self-seeking! Occupy, possess every corner of my heart! I lay my hands on You, The One Who is Absolute for God, My Burnt offering! I love You!

This song helps me to express my desire and prayer for 2012. Even though there may be little willingness within me, I say yes and give You full permission, Lord. Touch every corner of my heart. Don't let me withhold any part, break every barrier or resistance to Your will in my life. Don't let me be self-seeking, Lord; but do all things for Your glory and honour. I want to be wholly consecrated to Thee, not in word alone but that all my being would be fully given to Thee, in Jesus name. Amen. May God bless the writer of this song.

Such a song can strengthen a fainting one... Lord, do cleanse my heart from all self-seeking that I'd truly want nothing but Thee; let my soul be occupied, possessed, Lord, that You would be magnified in me.
I say Yes … be at home within me… Lord, do cleanse my heart from self-seeking….that You would be magnified…

Amen!! Lord cause us to absolutely surrender ourselves to You not in words alone but in all our being. Indeed, Lord, You are the only One who offered Yourself without reluctance unto God.
Lord, You're dwelling in our spirit; moving, spreading outward day by day. There's a whisper of Amen within us in response to all that You would say.
Lord we give You the ground to work in us, to touch every corner of our hearts, to break through us until we are completely dependent and absolute to You. Until You make Your home in our hearts.
Lord, we love You. Thank You!!
